cause.description:
Everyone wants to see Harry Potter defeat he-who-must-not-be-named but J.K. Rowling is getting lazy and thinks that when he kills he-who-must-not-be-named, Harry will die too! How outragous!
1. Stop Harry Potter dieing!
cause.mission: Stop J.K. Rowling killing Harry Potter off
cause.name: Harry Potter is going to Die!
